QuestData.Title: First Things First
QuestData.Description: Listen up, $r!$b$bThis entire region is full of crises. Everywhere you look you'll find those who could use your assistance.$b$b<Kunz looks you squarely in the eye.>$b$bNo one needs your help right now more than Riannah. The scourge have forced their way between us, leaving her and those she commands isolated.$b$bLight's Breach, where her forces are holding out, lies just southwest of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Kunz at Argent Stand wants you to report to Sergeant Riannah at Light's Breach.
QuestData.RewardText: My report must have made it through to Kunz.$b$bIt is good to know that he is well.
